attributes.action: scrap the proposed Super League Franchise/Licenses in Rugby League
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We firmly believe that the franchise system will be very damaging for the National Leagues, just as the introduction of “Super League" was. With no promotion to the games highest level what will clubs be playing for? A hollow victory in a pointless Grand Final? With nothing to aspire to the fans will become disillusioned with the game and make their feelings known the only way they can – through the turnstiles. Is your club as well supported as it was before “Super League"?

Those of us who are opposed to the franchise system need to come together to take action.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
